summary: VA is required to give preference to veteran-owned small businesses when awarding contracts, which it does using the Veterans First program. VA changed some aspects of this program following a 2016 Supreme Court decision. We found that VA increased obligations and awards set aside for veteran-owned small businesses following the Supreme Court decision. We also found that contracting officers faced challenges implementing some aspects of...
title: Veterans First Program: VA Needs to Address Implementation Challenges and Strengthen Oversight of Subcontracting Limitations
